Posts.Content: Nov 11, 2014 09:45AM churlMcLicious wrote: My hall of shame entry is that--I have a cleaning service every other week. It is owned by a woman who was my dear friend long before she cleaned for me. She told me once that my house takes her as long to clean as some she does that are twice the size. Twice the size--imagine that. She tried to soften the blow by telling me that it was because someone was almost always home (I homeschool my son and my mom lives with us)--but I think it may just be because we are messing. Entry Two: As I said above, my mom lives with us. She is 84 and very active. She insists on doing all the laundry and dishes and she cooks almost every night. I let her.
